title: New: miss t.erner – Starship
body: Berlin two piece **miss t.** **erner** conjure up an ethereal atmosphere on their debut track _Starship_ that would bring **James Blake** out in a cold sweat. With the Blake-esque beat rumbling beneath the surface and elegant, ever-so-tender vocals hovering alluring over a refined piano section, it’s a stunning composition. The repeated lyric _“I try so hard, that it breaks my heart”_, will be echoing around your head for hours after several listens. Whilst I can find no information whatsoever on the duo, aside from the quote on their myspace page – “Miss t.erner is a sound-accoustic marriage between the Berlin based **Mr. Terner** and **Miss T** of Sweden”, I’m extremely excited to hear more. Check out _Starship_ below. Starship by miss t.erner
